item.title: python3 formatting with black
item.description: I see formatting consistency provided by the black command helps me. The black is available as Debian package and its upstream is at https://github.com/psf/black Lint tools before black pycodestyle (formerly called pep8) flake8 (bundle of: pycodestyle + pyflakes). Install black $ sudo apt install python3-black Use black $ black a-python-code-directory/ or $ black a-python-code-file.py Make black to work with other tools Adding followings to pyproject.
